quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Killers and Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, singles, fuss. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In 2001 Christina Aguilera collaborated with this Latin pop star on the single Nobody Wants to Be Lonely.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ricky Martin

questions.question: Which single from the album Hot Fuss by The Killers had a chandelier on its cover?

options.text: All These Things That Ive Done

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Smile Like You Mean It

questions.question: Which of these singles by Christina Aguilera has occupied the number one position of the Billboard Hot 100?

options.text: Come on Over Baby (All I Want Is You)

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: The video for what song features The Killers dressed up as cowboys?

options.text: All These Things That Ive Done

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All These Things That Ive Done

questions.question: Brandon Flowers, famous as lead singer of The Killers, got married in 2005.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which member of The Killers has been compared to Jason Lee, from the TV series, My Name Is Earl?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ronnie Vannucci

questions.question: What song by The Killers includes the lyrics: Never thought Id let a rumor ruin my moonlight.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Somebody Told Me

questions.question: What song from the U.S. version of The Killers album Hot Fuss, was not on the U.K. version?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Change Your Mind

questions.question: What band was singer Brandon Flowers kicked out of before he joined The Killers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Blush Response

questions.question: Christina Aguilera worked with Lil Kim, Mya and Pink on one of the songs for the soundtrack of this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Moulin Rouge

questions.question: Christina María Aguilera was born on December 18, 1980 in this city.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New York

questions.question: In what city was the band The Killers formed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Las Vegas, Nevada

questions.question: As a youngster Christina Aguilera was subjected to ridicule and vandalism by her peers and other people. What was the reason for this according to VH1s Driven?

options.text: At that time she had a very large nose.
They were jealous of her talent.
They were envious for her family was rich.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They were jealous of her talent.

questions.question: What song by The Killers was released on the Spiderman 3 soundtrack?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Move Away

questions.question: What is the name of the Christmas song recorded by The Killers in 2006?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Great Big Sled

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and Composer
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, isorhythm, poet. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Did Mark Lindsay sing the song Indian Reservation?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Bartonlino de Padova was a member of which religious order?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Carmelite order

questions.question: Who wrote the song Indian Reservation?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John D. Loudermilk

questions.question: Which of the following was named after Alfonso X?

options.text: The summit of an Italian mountain

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A crater on the moon

questions.question: Andrea da Firenze, who was commissioned by the Servite house in Florence to build an organ, hired what other composer as a consultant?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Francesco Landini

questions.question: What song opens with these lines: Why do I just lie awake and think of you. I need some sleep. Tomorrow I have things to do. Every time I close my eyes I see your face, So I try to read, but all I do is lose my place?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Obsessed

questions.question: Who is often credited with developing the concept of isorhythm?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Philippe de Vitry

questions.question: Spanish monarch Alfonso X married Violante of Aragon when she was 10 years old but he almost had their marriage annulled. Why?

options.text: Because he later discovered that she was an illegitimate daughter of King James I
Because It was later discovered that she had an unsightly birthmark in her pelvic area
Because she had not yet produced any children and it was feared that she was barren
Because King James I didnt follow through with the agreed financial obligations

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because she had not yet produced any children and it was feared that she was barren

questions.question: Which is the only work that can be positively ascribed to music theorist and composer Hucbald?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: De Harmonica Institutione

questions.question: In 1959, the song Indian Reservation was released by Marvin Rainwater, but under a different name. What was it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Pale Faced Indian

questions.question: Messe de Nostre Dame (Mass of Our Lady) is a polyphonic mass attributed to which composer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Guillaume de Machaut

questions.question: Name the wife of poet and musician Adam de la Halle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marie

questions.question: Which composer appears as a character in purgatory doing penance for lust in Dantes work The Divine Comedy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arnaut Daniel

questions.question: What is the name of this song which contains the following lyrics: ...we can go slow or make it go faster down through the woods and out to the pasture long as Im with you it really dont matter climb up in my lap and drive if you want to girl you know you got me to hold on to we can go to town..
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Big Green Tractor

questions.question: Which of these works by Adam de la Halle is considered to be a forerunner of comic opera?

options.text: Le jeu de Robin et Marion
La Chanson du roi de Sicile
La chanson du Henri de la Halle

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Le jeu de Robin et Marion

options.text: d it makes no sense at all?

questions.question: I was ridin shotgun with my hair undun in the frontseat of his car. Hes got one hand on the steerin wheel the other on my heart. I look around, turn the radio down. He says baby is something wrong. I say nothin I was just thinkin how we dont have a song. And he said, our song is a slim screen door sneakin out late tappin on your window. When were on the phone and ya talk real slow cause its late and your momma dont know.................... What song is it from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Our Song

questions.question: What song are these lyrics from: Under a lovers sky Im Gonna be with you And no ones gonna be around If you think that you wont fall Well just wait until Till the sun goes down Underneath the starlight, starlight Theres a magical feeling so right Itll steal your heart tonight

questions.question: What song are the following lyrics from: How you chose to express yourself. Its all yor own and I can tell it comes naturally. It comes naturally. you follow what you feel inside listen to it if you dont have to try. It comes naturally. mmmmm it comes naturally. And it takes my breath away. You are the thunder and I am the lightning. And I love the way you know who you are and to me its exciting when you know its meant to be. everything comes naturally, it comes naturally when youre with me baby.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Naturally

questions.question: Theres only two types of people in the world; the ones that entertain and the ones that observe. Well baby Im a  put on a show kinda girl. Dont like the backseat gotta be first. She had his box of letters in the passenger seat, ... and when the church doors opened up wide she put her veil down, ... trying to hide the tears?

questions.question: What song contains the following lyrics: Everyday I try to play another game, but my heart cant take it. I try to find another boy, but all the while I cant face the light. Why do I miss you so much? I wanna stop this hurt inside.Oh baby please give us one more try. Baby come back. I see you out with all your friends..

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Tito Puente and Album
